page.title: 14ANNA SCHERE'S THEATRE
page.content: This drama theatre in Islington,is open for children and young adults from the ages of 6 to about 18 who get the chance to act,and learn about the theatre. There used to be lessons twice a week but due to the enormous waiting list the management had to cut down to once a week.Although on Friday here is a special 'Friday group' for the proffesional actors/actresses, who according to Anna have accomplished a lot in the time they have been there, they also have to be under contract.It costs 40p per week for junior/secondary groups and 60p for the youth group. Every so often they put on shows open to the public.'The Festival Of Plays' derives from the best plays made up by the groups over a certain period of time.They also have open days which are free and anyone can go and watch.
